item.title: Tools
item.description: R/RStudio GitHub Slack R is the statistical programming language we will learn in this class. We will interface with R using RStudio, a fully feautred IDE. Go to https://vm-manage.oit.duke.edu/ to access RStudio and log in with your Net ID. GitHub is a web-based version control repository and Internet hosting service. We will be using GitHub in this course as a collaboration platform and a course management system (i.
